results.t: Russell 2000 Index Definition and Key Metrics
results.p: The Russell 2000 Index is a stock market index that measures the performance of the 2,000 smaller companies included in the Russell 3000 Index.

results.t: RUT: Russell 2000 Index - Stock Price, Quote and News
results.p: Get Russell 2000 Index (.RUT:Exchange) real-time stock quotes, news, price and financial information from CNBC.
